Description: Privately, during the day, you may return home to ask the storyteller any one yes or no question

The storyteller can break the rules. If the storyteller is executed, good wins (If there isn’t an atheist, then evil wins if this happens). There are no evil players; everybody knows that demons aren’t real, idiot.
Nightly, learn the name of a living player of a different type from (demon, minion, outsider, or town) than last night. There might be +1 outsider
Start knowing 1 evil player. If they die, learn a different evil player that night. +1 Minion, -1 Town
Gain the ability of the last executed person. If they were evil, you are poisoned until a good player is executed
Nightly, choose a player. You learn 1 good and 1 evil role they might be, one of which is correct
Nightly learn how many of your 2 closest neighbors are evil
If you are alive in the final 3, all ghost votes are refreshed
Once per game, you may go home during discussion to ask the storyteller for a founded piece of advice to help good win
Nightly, learn if the demon voted that day
First time you die, don’t
Nightly, check 2 people and learn if the demon is among them. 1 person in the game will register as a red herring
Nightly, you may choose to guess someone’s role. If you are wrong, you die
Each day, you may publicly declare a rumor. If the rumor is true, someone will die during the night
Start knowing 1 person is a specific good role; if they die from the demon you die too
Demons and minions do not know each other until you die
Start knowing 1 of 2 people is a specific minion
Start knowing 1 of 2 people is a specific outsider
At night, choose 1 living player. If they are innocent, they die, but the demon can't kill anyone else that night
The minion is told that either you or the demon is their demon, and the demon is told that either you or the minion is their minion
If nobody is executed in the final 3, town wins. When you are attacked, another town may die instead
Nightly, choose someone to protect from the demon
Once per game, at night, one chosen player learns that you are the nightwatchmen
Start with a list of 2 good players and 1 evil, you don't know which is which
Nightly, learn how many dead people are evil
Your ghost vote can be used up to 3 times instead of once
Once per game, at night, you may select a town role from the script to gain the ability of. If that role is in play, its player becomes drunk until the philosopher dies or stops being the philosopher
Start knowing 1 in-play town role. If you act mad as that role, and the player with that role dies, you gain that role ability
If a team has not yet won 3 days after your death, you return to life and cannot be killed again by the same method
If you die during the night, choose a player to learn the role of
You can't die. Nightly, choose a living player, who is told they were visited by the Sailor. You or they are drunk until the start of the next night
Once per game, you may check if 2 people are on same team at night
Once per game, during the town meeting, attempt to kill another player; they die if they’re the demon
Cannot be killed by the demon at night
If both of your living neighbors are good, neither can die
Nightly, learn if the minion nominated someone that day
Nightly, learn which role died by execution
If the first person to nominate you is good, they are instantly executed
Start knowing 1 of 2 people is a specific town
Each night, choose a player to be your master. You cannot vote in favor of an execution unless your master does
You think you are a specific town role that is not in play, but your ability doesn’t work

If you and a neighbor agree to kill your other neighbor, and tell the storyteller in town square during discussion time, that agreed-upon other neighbor will die during the night. If the Gangster gets both to agree to kill the other, they choose which will actually die at night
You may only nominate once. When you do so, if the player you nominated isnt the demon, they instantly die
Whichever side wins, loses, and vice-versa. This effect persists even once you die
You think you are a specific demon; the actual demon knows who you choose to try to kill
Each night, choose three living players (before anyone dies that night). If one is executed the following day, one of the other two, if alive, will be instead
On the first night, pick a player. You are their alignment for the rest of the game, but are not told what that alignment is
If you are the most influential in good losing, become and win with evil
May register as some manner of evil to other role abilities, even after dying
If you’re executed by the town, evil wins
When you die, a player becomes a drunk for the rest of the game

Once there are two or more dead players, the following effects occur: Ghost votes become unlimited, only the voudon and dead players may vote, and the 'marked for execution' threshold becomes 1. Once killed, all three effects are undone and you do not recieve a ghost vote
Once per game, at night, choose a player to die. This bypasses defensive abilities
+2 Outsiders
While alive, your demon has a specific good role ability; you both know which
Nightly, choose a player to be mad that they are a specific role until the next night, or they might die
Start knowing a specific town and their role. They know that you are their Evil Twin. If the town twin is executed, evil wins. Good cannot win while both are alive
If you publicly announce that they are the goblin for the first time once nominated, and are executed that day, evil wins
You think you are a specific town or outsider role that is not in play, but your ability doesn’t work and you’re actually a minion. You will always neighbor the demon
If the demon is executed, continue for another day. If a good player is executed after the demon, evil win

Start knowing a secret word. The first good player who says the secret word to the storyteller at any time, public or private, turns evil that night. The Mezepheles does not learn if someone has been converted, but the converted player does
Nightly, poison 1 player until the next night begins
If the demon dies when there are 5 or more people alive, you become the demon
You gain 3 bluffs. On night 2, turn a player of your choice into a demon of your choice from the active script who acts immediately. There is no demon at the start of the game.
Nightly, learn either one specified player's role or two random player's roles. You may appear as good to role abilities.
Nightly, choose a player. If they nominate someone, they die. This ability is disabled the moment 3 or less people remain alive

+1 minion. The Agonyxolotl is not a player, but must instead be babysat (held in the inventory) by a living minion. Each night, all minions wake and decide who will babysit Agonyxolotl, acting as demon for the day. If the present babysitter dies, evil loses. Nightly, someone will die. Whether the babysitter is drunk or poisoned does not affect the Agonyxolotl

Nightly, choose a living player to die. The first time per game an outsider is killed like this, the original Fang Gu dies and the targeted outsider becomes the new Fang Gu. +1 Outsider instead of town
All players are told that Freddy is free. After 5 nights, evil wins. If more than 1 good player is executed, evil wins. Freddy does not kill any players during the night
Each night, select a location somewhere in town to plant a mine. Mines persist for the rest of the game, and are only visible to evil players. When a player steps on a mine, they immediately die
Nightly, choose a living player to die. If you kill yourself like this, your minion becomes an Imp

There are 5 players of Legion, who all know each other, but none recieve bluffs. Executions fail if only evil players voted. Members of legion may appear as demons or minions to role abilities. Each night, someone will die. There are no minions or outsiders.
Nightly, choose a role. If a player with that role exists, they die. If nobody has the role, the storyteller decides who dies
Nightly, choose 3 living players. Each is informed that they have been selected. Each must individually choose whether to live or die. If all choose to live, all die
Nightly, if nobody died today, choose a living player to die. When you die, you feign death and “Come Back” to life once, while still appearing as dead (dead players can still be nominated!)
Nightly, choose a living player to die. If you kill your minion, they retain their ability and permanently poison an adjacent town. -1 Outsider
When the game begins, you are informed of a secret phrase. Any time you publicly say the phrase, a player may die that night, up to a maximum of 3 (diminishing returns after first time spoken)
